statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.OrderID , AA.Note , AA.DisplayToCustomerYn
FROM dbo.TOrderNote AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.OrderID = #OrderID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TOrderNote AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TOrderNote ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, OrderID, Note, DisplayToCustomerYn ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #OrderID#, #Note#, #DisplayToCustomerYn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TOrderNote SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, OrderID = #OrderID# , Note = #Note# , DisplayToCustomerYn = #DisplayToCustomerYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
